41 //==============================================================================
42 
43 ParticleRRHO::ParticleRRHO(const IO::XmlElement& xml_element)
44  : m_hform(0), m_steric(0), m_linearity(0), m_rotational_t(0)
45 {
46  // Load information stored in child elements
47  IO::XmlElement::const_iterator iter = xml_element.begin();
48 
49  for ( ; iter != xml_element.end(); ++iter) {
50  if (iter->tag() == "formation_enthalpy") {
51  m_hform = atof(String::trim(iter->text()).c_str());
52  }
53  else if (iter->tag() == "steric_factor") {
54  m_steric = atoi(String::trim(iter->text()).c_str());
55  }
56  else if (iter->tag() == "linear") {
57  std::string yesno = String::trim(iter->text());
58  if (yesno == "yes")
59  m_linearity = 2;
60  else if (yesno == "no")
61  m_linearity = 3;
62  else {
63  iter->parseError(
64  "Values for linear can only be \"yes\" or \"no\"!");
65  }
66  }
67  else if (iter->tag() == "rotational_temperature") {
68  m_rotational_t = atof(String::trim(iter->text()).c_str());
69  }
70  else if (iter->tag() == "vibrational_temperatures") {
71  std::vector<std::string> tokens;
72  String::tokenize(iter->text(), tokens, " ,\t\n\r\f\v");
73 
74  std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator t_iter = tokens.begin();
75  for ( ; t_iter != tokens.end(); ++t_iter)
76  m_vibrational_energies.push_back(atof(t_iter->c_str()));
77  }
78  else if (iter->tag() == "electronic_levels") {
79  IO::XmlElement::const_iterator level_iter = iter->begin();
80 
81  int degeneracy;
82  double temperature;
83 
84  for ( ; level_iter != iter->end(); ++level_iter) {
85  if (level_iter->tag() == "level") {
86  level_iter->getAttribute("degeneracy", degeneracy);
87  level_iter->getAttribute("energy", temperature);
88 
89  // convert from 1/cm to K
90  m_electronic_energies.push_back(
91  std::make_pair(degeneracy, temperature * 1.4387));
92  }
93  }
94  }
95  }
96 }
97 
98 //==============================================================================
99 
100 ParticleRRHO::ParticleRRHO(const ParticleRRHO& rrho, const size_t level)
101  : m_hform(rrho.m_hform + RU*rrho.electronicEnergy(level).second),
102  m_steric(rrho.m_steric),
103  m_linearity(rrho.m_linearity),
104  m_rotational_t(rrho.m_rotational_t),
105  m_electronic_energies(1, std::make_pair(rrho.electronicEnergy(level).first, 0.0)),
106  m_vibrational_energies(rrho.m_vibrational_energies)
107 {
108  // Make sure the level used is actually present in the given RRHO parameters
109  assert(level < rrho.nElectronicLevels());
110 }
111
